Title: Good Morning, Vietnam
Production_Co: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners III
Cast: Robin Williams, Forest Whitaker, Tung Thanh Tran, Chintara Sukapatana, Bruno Kirby, Robert Wuhl, J.T. Walsh, Noble Willingham, Richard Edson, Juney Smith, Richard Portnow, Floyd Vivino, Cu Ba Nguyen, Dan Stanton, Don Stanton
Plot: An unorthodox and irreverent DJ begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the US Armed Services Radio station in Vietnam. A new Disc Jockey is shipped from Crete to Vietnam to bring humor to Armed Forces Radio. He turns the studio on its ear and becomes wildly popular with the troops but runs afoul of the middle management who think he isn't G.I. enough. While he is off the air, he tries to meet Vietnamese especially girls, and begins to have brushes with the real war that never appears on the radio. Written by John Vogel <jlvogel@comcast.net>
Keywords: radio, vietnam, vietnamese, disc jockey, record player
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 3 nominations.
Actors: Robin Williams, Forest Whitaker, Tung Thanh Tran
Description: Directed by Barry Levinson.  With Robin Williams, Forest Whitaker, Tung Thanh Tran, Chintara Sukapatana. An unorthodox and irreverent DJ begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the US Armed Services Radio station in Vietnam.
